description: The Stormline Stretch Rain Pants provide the security you need to push your limits no matter what the weather holds. With their BD.dry™ waterproof/ breathable technology and stretch fabric, these pants are durable, comfortable and reliable when the storms roll in.
name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Full Zip Rain Pants, Long - Mens

specs.value: BD.dry™ 2.5L, Two-way stretch woven face with DWR finish - 100% Nylon
